comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: In New York in March, 1915 to play in the Women's National Indoor Tennis Tournament at the Seventh Regiment Armory (Park Avenue Armory), where this photo was probably taken. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F00A10FE3E5A15738... She made it to the Semi-Finals and was defeated by the eventual champion, Molla Bjurstedt.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
artolog:

Great to be able to connect this photo to the one of Bjurstedt. Thanks for providing the context - and, as always, for citing the source of your info!
